categories: Category:The Clone Wars: Stories of Light and Dark

nodes.text: "Almost a Jedi" is a short story that was published in the anthology The Clone Wars: Stories of Light and Dark, adapting the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode "A Necessary Bond." It was written by Sarah Beth Durst, and published on August 25, 2020 by Disney–Lucasfilm Press.
In the story, Katooni mistakenly refers to Anakin Skywalker as a Jedi Master, when Skywalker is in fact a Jedi Knight.
